raw_text: We decided to prioritize integration with Stripe over PayPal due to broader customer usage patterns.
summary: The priority was given to integrating with Stripe instead of PayPal, as the user base for Stripe appears to be more extensive based on current customer usage patterns.

raw_text: We decided to remove the onboarding walkthrough from MVP to save development time.
summary: The team opted to forgo the inclusion of an onboarding walkthrough during the Minimum Viable Product (MVP) stage, with the goal of expediting the development process.
